ChatBotServer.SockServer - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the private inner class which contains the code for setting up a client thread.
checkMovePair(String, String) - Static method in class Game
Takes in the current players move and also the move of another player and returns the win/lose/tie result from the pair.
chosenChannel - Variable in class ChatBotClient
This boolean is false until the user has chosen a legitimate channel to enter.
